Docs.summary: Provides initialization settings for a implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings> is a class for settings that are used by a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>; however, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings> does not hold any specific settings. The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter> constructor does not use this settings class as an argument, nor does any other <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter> member use it. Instead, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> classes include their own settings classes as construction arguments; both classes add actual settings and are based on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings>.
